TEXT.TITLE: IDA EXTENDS 37.1 MLN DLRS IN AFRICA LOANS
TEXT.BODY: The World Bank said it will provide 37.1 mln dlrs to Tanzania and Rwanda through the International Development Association (IDA), the bank's concessionary lending affiliate. Tanzania will recieve a 23 mln dlr IDA loan to help rehabilitate its telecommunications network, the bank said. The 14.1 mln dlr IDA loan to Rwanda will help finance tropical forest conservation projects and a reforestation program, the bank said. The IDA credit is for 50 years, including 10 years of grace, and carries no interest, the bank said. Reuter
